description: With over 475 detailed routes, this guidebook outlines scrambling, technical rock and ice climbs on 50 of the challenging mountains of Vancouver Island.  With a focus on technical peaks and climbing routes, it's a great resource for Island alpinists planning their next adventure. Includes high resolution photos, topographical maps, detailed access and route descriptions, with select images from some of the Island’s classic climbs.
name: Island Alpine Climbing
